original_title: Station WLARC: Tragedy or Success Story?
overview: In 1957, the radio station WLARC brought their "local" community together as a last-ditch effort towards a saving grace for the broadcast, while claiming it all in the name of peace and unity for the community. However, the thing that they've created together may have done more harm than good.
title: Station WLARC: Tragedy or Success Story?
